author: cnbc.com
title: Southwest Airlines Declares 166th Consecutive Quarterly Dividend
text:
DALLAS, Southwest Airlines Co. (NYSE: LUV) Board of Directors declared a quarterly dividend of $.125 per share to Shareholders of record at the close of business on March 7, 2018 on all shares then issued and outstanding. The 166 th consecutive dividend will be paid on March 28, 2018.
SW-DSR
